Package org.apache.gora.util

Class Summary
AvroUtils An utility class for Avro related tasks
ByteUtils Utility class that handles byte arrays, conversions to/from other types.
ClassLoadingUtils  
IOUtils An utility class for I/O related functionality.
LicenseHeaders Utility class which specifies a collection of license headers which can be used within the GoraCompiler for generating alternative license headers for Java interfaces and classes generated from protocols and schemas.
NodeWalker A utility class that allows the walking of any DOM tree using a stack instead of recursion.
Null Placeholder for Null type arguments
ReflectionUtils Utility methods related to reflection
StringUtils An utility class for String related functionality.
TimingUtil  
VersionInfo This class finds the package info for Gora and the GoraVersionAnnotation information.
WritableUtils An utility class for Writable related functionality.
 

Exception Summary
GoraException Gora specific exception.
OperationNotSupportedException Operation is not supported or implemented.
